verses.verse: O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> how <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H575><s%> shall I <S%H7768>cry,<s%> and thou wilt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8085>hear!<s%> even cry <S%H2199>out<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee of <S%H2555>violence,<s%> and thou wilt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3467>save!<s%>

Why <S%H4100><s%> dost thou <S%H7200>show<s%> me <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> and cause me to <S%H5027>behold<s%> <S%H5999>grievance?<s%> for <S%H7701>spoiling<s%> and <S%H2555>violence<s%> are <S%H5048>before<s%> me: and there <S%H1961>are<s%> that raise <S%H5375>up<s%> <S%H7379>strife<s%> and <S%H4066>contention.<s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> is <S%H6313>slacked,<s%> and <S%H4941>judgment<s%> doth <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H5331><s%> go <S%H3318>forth:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> doth compass <S%H3803>about<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H6127>wrong<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> <S%H3318>proceedeth.<s%>

Behold <S%H7200><s%> ye among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and <S%H5027>regard,<s%> and wonder <S%H8539>marvelously:<s%> <S%H8539><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I will <S%H6466>work<s%> a <S%H6467>work<s%> in your <S%H3117>days,<s%> which ye will <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H539>believe,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> it be <S%H5608>told<s%> you.

For, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2009>lo,<s%> I raise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> that <S%H4751>bitter<s%> and <S%H4116>hasty<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> which shall <S%H1980>march<s%> through the <S%H4800>breadth<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the dwelling <S%H4908>places<s%> that are <S%H3808>not<s%> theirs.
They <S%H1931><s%> are <S%H366>terrible<s%> and <S%H3372>dreadful:<s%> their <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and their <S%H7613>dignity<s%> shall <S%H3318>proceed<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> themselves.

Their <S%H5483>horses<s%> also are <S%H7043>swifter<s%> than the <S%H4480>leopards,<s%> <S%H5246><s%> and are more <S%H2300>fierce<s%> than the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H4480>wolves:<s%> <S%H2061><s%> and their <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> shall <S%H6335>spread<s%> themselves, and their <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H4480>far;<s%> <S%H7350><s%> they shall <S%H5774>fly<s%> as the <S%H5404>eagle<s%> that <S%H2363>hasteth<s%> to <S%H398>eat.<s%>

They shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> for <S%H2555>violence:<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> shall sup <S%H4041>up<s%> as the east <S%H6921>wind,<s%> and they shall <S%H622>gather<s%> the <S%H7628>captivity<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand.<s%>

And <S%H1931>they<s%> shall <S%H7046>scoff<s%> at the <S%H4428>kings,<s%> and the <S%H7336>princes<s%> shall be a <S%H4890>scorn<s%> unto them: <S%H1931>they<s%> shall <S%H7832>deride<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4013>stronghold;<s%> for they shall <S%H6651>heap<s%> <S%H6083>dust,<s%> and <S%H3920>take<s%> it.

Then <S%H227><s%> shall his <S%H7307>mind<s%> <S%H2498>change,<s%> and he shall pass <S%H5674>over,<s%> and <S%H816>offend,<s%> imputing <S%H2098>this<s%> his <S%H3581>power<s%> unto his <S%H433>god.<s%>

Art <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> from <S%H4480>everlasting,<s%> <S%H6924><s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> mine Holy <S%H6918>One?<s%> we shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4191>die.<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> thou hast <S%H7760>ordained<s%> them for <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> and, O mighty <S%H6697>God,<s%> thou hast <S%H3245>established<s%> them for <S%H3198>correction.<s%>

Thou art of <S%H2889>purer<s%> <S%H5869>eyes<s%> than to <S%H4480>behold<s%> <S%H7200><s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and <S%H3201>canst<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5027>look<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> <S%H5999>iniquity:<s%> <S%H4100>wherefore<s%> <S%H5027>lookest<s%> thou upon them that deal <S%H898>treacherously,<s%> and holdest thy <S%H2790>tongue<s%> when the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1104>devoureth<s%> the man that is more <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> he?
And <S%H6213>makest<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> as the <S%H1709>fishes<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> as the creeping <S%H7431>things,<s%> that have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4910>ruler<s%> over them?

They take <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them with the <S%H2443>angle,<s%> they <S%H1641>catch<s%> them in their <S%H2764>net,<s%> and <S%H622>gather<s%> them in their <S%H4365>drag:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> and are <S%H1523>glad.<s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> unto their <S%H2764>net,<s%> and burn <S%H6999>incense<s%> unto their <S%H4365>drag;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> by <S%H1992>them<s%> their <S%H2506>portion<s%> is <S%H8082>fat,<s%> and their <S%H3978>meat<s%> <S%H1277>plenteous.<s%>

Shall they <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H7324>empty<s%> their <S%H2764>net,<s%> and <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2550>spare<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> to <S%H2026>slay<s%> the <S%H1471>nations?<s%>
